descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toEmail.name: toEmail
toEmail.description: Email address of the recipient. Multiple ones can be separated by comma.
toEmail.ai_hint: Email address of the recipient. Multiple ones can be separated by comma.

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: bccEmail
options.description: BCC Recipients of the email separated by ,

options.name: ccEmail
options.description: Cc recipients of the email separated by ,

options.name: replyTo
options.description: The reply-to email address. Multiple ones can be separated by comma.

options.name: trackClicks
options.description: Enable or disable open tracking on this message

options.name: trackOpens
options.description: Enable or disable open tracking on this message

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

variablesUi.name: variablesUi
variablesUi.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

templateId.name: templateId
templateId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
templateId.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

from.name: from
from.description: Customizable sender name. Should be between 3 and 11 characters in length, only alphanumeric characters are allowed.
from.ai_hint: Customizable sender name. Should be between 3 and 11 characters in length, only alphanumeric characters are allowed.

to.name: to
to.description: Message recipient. Should be between 3 and 15 characters in length. The number always starts with a plus sign followed by a country code, followed by the number. Phone numbers are expected to comply with the E.164 format.
to.ai_hint: Message recipient. Should be between 3 and 15 characters in length. The number always starts with a plus sign followed by a country code, followed by the number. Phone numbers are expected to comply with the E.164 format.

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'email' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'email' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'fromEmail'
IF resource == 'email' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'toEmail'
IF resource == 'email' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF resource == 'email' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'html'
IF resource == 'email' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsonParameters'
IF resource == 'email' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'email' AND operation == 'send' AND jsonParameters == True THEN SHOW parameter 'variablesJson'
IF resource == 'email' AND operation == 'send' AND jsonParameters == False THEN SHOW parameter 'variablesUi'
IF resource == 'email' AND operation == 'sendTemplate' THEN SHOW parameter 'fromEmail'
IF resource == 'email' AND operation == 'sendTemplate' THEN SHOW parameter 'toEmail'
IF resource == 'email' AND operation == 'sendTemplate' THEN SHOW parameter 'templateId'
IF resource == 'email' AND operation == 'sendTemplate' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsonParameters'
IF resource == 'email' AND operation == 'sendTemplate' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'email' AND operation == 'sendTemplate' AND jsonParameters == False THEN SHOW parameter 'variablesUi'
IF resource == 'email' AND operation == 'sendTemplate' AND jsonParameters == True THEN SHOW parameter 'variablesJson'
IF resource == 'sms' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'sms' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'from'
IF resource == 'sms' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'to'
IF resource == 'sms' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
